list.subject: TOSAN , banking and payment solutions provider
list.position: my position in TOSAN is full stack developer

dataList.text: Experience in using  ReactJS to Designing and developing a big progressive web application (PWA) To manage ATMs, so the physical presence of supervisors is no longer needed to solve ATM errors and needs . I manage state of this application with Redux and try to have clean and reusable high order components . Also i used hooks to have an optimized application.
Good knowledge of API, Rest API and Authentication Method (for example JWT).
Setting up a Nodejs server to connect the application to handle requests and responses sent from another server.
designing  a big log system  based on IPs of each user.

This server reads the main variables from the configuration file outside the program, makes a request to the configuration file and reads the data in an encoded form, the data is decoded in the server and the server is set based on these configurations.
Extensively used CSS in styled- components and bootstrap for styling the pages.
Responsible to attend daily scrum and share the sprint's work status.
Mentored new team members.

list.subject: Magnet Ad services-Hassin Company

dataList.text: Proficient in developing Single Page Applications(SPA) using JavaScript MVC framework such as React JS . Proficient in create reusable components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux).
UX Researcher and design wireframe based on best flow for users.
Creation wireframes and process maps using Balsamiq and adobe xd.
Collaborating with an Agile team who use Scrum as their methodology of software. development. Collaborating with back-end team and web designers to implement the features with stability.
Work cohesively with other talented developers in a positive, team environment to solve problems.
